dialogues.text: You remember that time - I think it was like 6th grade - Eomma caught us watching Magnum PI. She banned us from TV for the whole summer because I introduced you to “graphic content!” Magnum PI. (beat) That was the worst feeling in the world. David turns off the TV.

dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: --When was the last time you saw her, by the way? Beat.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You know what, I’d have to think about that, it’s really been awhi-- David's PHONE RINGS. Peter quickly stands up.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (re: tea) I think this needs some honey. Meanwhile we WIDEN to see David’s-

dialogues.text: David looks at his phone, debating whether to answer it a continues to RING and then... IGNORE.

dialogues.text: (from the kitchen) Who was that?

dialogues.text: Work.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: --Going back to the previous question, when did you say you last saw her? Beat. Peter stops. Thinks.  Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 88.

dialogues.text: Last night was fun.

dialogues.text: I feel so weird doing this. As Peter begins to understand what David’s saying, so do David is reciting the texts between Peter and Margot.

dialogues.text: I mean, technically, it'll be legal soon. Never tell your Dad. You free tonight? Yesterday was crazy. What about tonight? David will kill me if he ever finds out. Seriously he'd murder me. Peter’s frozen. David arrives at the kitchen.

dialogues.text: She told you that?

Ever since Pam, you’ve just been so caught up in your charade of pretending everything was okay when everything was clearly not that you stopped talking to Margot about the only thing that’s been on her mind for the last two years.

He puts the phone to his ear and leaves Peter’s apartment But then, halfway through Vick’s voicemail and almost at car (as seen through the same living room window from earlier), David stops dead in his tracks... .+-and crumbles to the pavement, just having heard the wo call any parent could get.

dialogues.text: A “BREAKING NEWS” GRAPHIC FLASHES ACROSS THE SCREEN to AC MUSIC as we CUT TO an educated female anchor and-

dialogues.speaker: FAUSTINE REA
dialogues.text: Good morning, I'm Faustine Rea. A parent’s worst nightmare comes true this morning for David Kim. Ina shocking and thoroughly-mind- boggling conclusion to a story that’s captivated the Bay Area, Margot Kim, missing now for 5 days, has just been tragically declared dead. Why? A taped confession. A picture appears to the right of the anchor. On it, a depraved-looking man. FAUSTINE REA (CONT’D) Randy Cartoff, released just six years ago for armed robbery and felony drug possession, uploaded the confession online before taking his own life. We’re going to play a segment of the 3-minute video now, but please be warned: the following contains graphic descriptions and disturbing content. Viewer discretion is advised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RANDY CARTOFF (50's) - feral, pockmarked, out of his mind stares STRAIGHT INTO THE CAMERA. Then he looks down at th crumbled piece of paper in his hands and reads from it.

dialogues.speaker: RANDY
dialogues.text: Dear girl in the green car, I’m sorry for what I did to you. I’m sorry for not listening to you when you begged me to stop. She was really hurt, wasn't she? (beat) I'm sorry for cutting you, putting you in your suitcases, and hiding you so no one would ever find you. I thought this would be easy. But it isn’t. But it isn’t...  Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 93.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Detective Vick speaks at a large press conference.

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: After analyzing the video online, we were able to track down the confessor’s identity. When we arrived at his Morgan Hill residence, Mr. Cartoff was deceased, seemingly by a self- inflicted gun wound. Sometimes these confessions are hoaxes, but based on his story, we were able to return to the lake site where we discovered trace DNA matching that of Mr. Cartoff in critical areas of the search zone. I have already spoken to her father, but at this point in the investigation, we are very confident... that Ms. Kim’s life was taken, on her way out of town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: A public memorial will be held for Ms. Kim in downtown San Jose this week. Details to come soon, but until then, the only thing we know for certain is that the search for Margot Kim is over.

dialogues.speaker: FUNERAL ONE BROWSER WINDOW
dialogues.text: One by one by one until, in one video- FLASHBACK. INT. DAVID’S BEDROOM - MORNING (HOME VIDEO) 12 Pam RECORDS while YOUNG MARGOT (5) jumps on a sleeping Da

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG MARGOT
dialogues.text: Wake up! Wake up!

dialogues.speaker: PAM, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Show us what you made in class, Mar. Margot holds up a drawing to the CAMERA. Written below: “Happy Father's Day to the BEST DAD EVER." PAUSE.

dialogues.speaker: DESKTOP
dialogues.text: On Finder, David DELETES the video. Then EMPTIES the tras

dialogues.speaker: FUNERAL ONE BROWSER WINDOW
dialogues.text: After he’s done watching, David HITS “SEND” on the videos “Thanks for uploading!" is written below a photo of-  128 96.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A freckled red-head in a headset shoots us a thumbs-up.

dialogues.speaker: FUNERAL ONE BROWSER WINDOW
dialogues.text: David moves to close the window. But then he stops. His cursor glides back to the picture. The freckled red-h smiles back. There's something off about it. About her. Suddenly, David OPENS Margot’s-

dialogues.speaker: PHOTOS APP
dialogues.text: He scrolls. Nope. Then he opens Margot’s-

dialogues.speaker: FACEBOOK
dialogues.text: David CLICKS through Margot’s tagged photos. Past Abby, p friends we've talked. Nothing. But then, David travels to

dialogues.speaker: YOUCAST
dialogues.text: David CLICKS on “Saved Videos," skims Margot’s live-casts -and revisits the profile of “fish_n_chips” (Hannah. 18. Server at Kirchick’s Diner. Pittsburgh, PA). David opens fish_n_ chips’ profile picture in full-screen places the picture of MemorialOne’s redhead next to it, compares the images and realizes: They're the same person. Suddenly, we begin to hear PRE-LAPPED AUDIO as-

dialogues.speaker: HANNAH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Hi, I was wondering if I could talk to Hannah.

dialogues.speaker: HANNAH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Speaking? David DRAGS Hannah’s YouCast profile picture-

dialogues.speaker: GOOGLE IMAGE SEARCH
dialogues.text: -into a Google Image Search as-  129 Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 97.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I’m calling in regards to my daughter, Margot Kim. You spoke to her online as ‘mkmania.’

dialogues.speaker: HANNAH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Um... You must have the wrong number. I’m talent, not representation. But I can connect you to my agent if you’d-- The search results load. They’re all photos of Hannah.

dialogues.speaker: I/E. STOCK IMAGES, (PHOTOS)
dialogues.text: Same smile, but different outfits and uniforms. She’s a m

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: --So you work as a waitress part time, then. Because you told the detective you were on a shift.

dialogues.speaker: GOOGLE IMAGE SEARCH
dialogues.text: Next to one result, the model’s name is listed: Hannah Pa

dialogues.speaker: HANNAH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: What detective?

dialogues.speaker: GOOGLE
dialogues.text: David googles the name, but can’t find what he’s looking

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: You are Hannah Pardy, correct? Red hair. Freckles?

dialogues.speaker: HANNAH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Yes! But I’m just an actress. But then David VISITS-

dialogues.speaker: PEOPLESMART
dialogues.text: He enters Hannah’s name, and parses through the results.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I don’t understand. Detective Vick, she called you 4 days ago and you told her you were at the diner when-

dialogues.speaker: HANNAH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Sir, I never got a call from the cops. What are you talking about?  130 131 Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 98. David finds the correct “Hannah Pardy” (she lives in Los Angeles) and then returns to her photos on the-

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Okay. Maybe I’m not being clear. On YouCast, you’ve been chatting with my daughter for months. Your user name is ‘fish_n_ chips.’ You’re a waitress from Pittsburgh. Your mom was in the hospital... Right? David lands on the photo of Hannah posing as a waitress a

dialogues.speaker: HANNAH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: What’s YouCast? RING. RING. RING. INT. DAVID’S BEDROOM - MOMENTS LATER (FACETIME VIDEO) 130 Seen through the open FaceTime display, a hyper-anxious D keeps his phone glued his ear as he paces back and forth

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Vick. Something doesn’t add up. Call me back when you get this. David hangs up and returns to his computer where-

dialogues.speaker: DESKTOP
dialogues.text: Text notifications from Peter slide onto the screen: “Hey called/texted you 3 times. Trying Margot’s phone now..." “When are you getting here? Ceremony's starting soon."

dialogues.speaker: OPERATOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: SVPD Missing Persons Unit. How can I help you? INT. DAVID’S BEDROOM - DAY (FACETIME VIDEO) 131 Through the open FaceTime video display, we see David che his phone and-

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Can you connect me through dispatch to an officer?

dialogues.speaker: GOOGLE CHROME AND FACETIME VIDEO DISPLAY A131
dialogues.text: David types in: “Detective Rosemary Vick." SEARCH.

dialogues.speaker: OPERATOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I’m sorry sir, that’s not possible. What is this regarding? Meanwhile, David opens the same articles that he research during his first talk with Vick. He cycles through them, searching for something as-

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: My name is David Kim, I’m trying to reach Detective Rosemary Vick--

dialogues.speaker: OPERATOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: --Oh, Mr. Kim. I am so sorry to hear about Margot. We are so torn up about it here.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Thank you but-- David is down to the last two articles and-

dialogues.speaker: OPERATOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: --Especially Rosemary. I have never seen someone so invested in a case. From the moment she volunteered to lead it, to the way she handled the investigation and dealt with the media the way she did--

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: --Wait. David stops at an article when-

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: What do you mean, volunteered? Above the article, a familiar photo. In it, Vick poses wi group of ex-convicts at a construction site.

dialogues.speaker: OPERATOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Sorry? The photo’s caption: “Off the clock, Officer Rosemary Vic helping build a new drug-rehabilitation clinic."  132 Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 100.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: You said Detective Vick “volunteered” to lead my case. I thought she was assigned to it.

dialogues.speaker: OPERATOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: No. She definitely volunteered. David PUNCHES INTO the photo. But instead of focusing on Vick, he ZOOMS to the eerily familiar ex-convict next to

dialogues.speaker: OPERATOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Unfortunately though, I still can’t patch you through dispatch. She’s probably on her way to Margot’s memorial service, though. If you’d like, I can connect you to her voicemail instead? And then we recognize him: Randy Cartoff, the man who kil Margot.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: (to himself) She didn’t run away from me. She didn’t run away from me.

dialogues.speaker: OPERATOR, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Mr. Kim?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Actually. I’d like to speak to the Deputy Sheriff, please.

dialogues.speaker: MEMORIALONE
dialogues.text: On the splash page, a live-stream link to watch the memor one million viewers already watching. David CLICKS the link and immediately, the MemorialOne vi stream FLICKERS TO LIFE. Through the FaceTime video display, we see David grab his keys, his coat, and then leave the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stream (seen via David’s laptop) AUTOMATICALLY SWITCH between three camera angles. The first: on the right. The second: on the left. And the third: in the back looking a

dialogues.speaker: A MAKESHIFT MEMORIAL
dialogues.text: Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 100A. An array of candles and flowers surround a poster of Marg Scattered throughout the pews, Isaac, Abby, Mr. Lee, and slew of recognizable faces wait in somber silence.  133 Blue Rev. (11/01/16) 101. At the front, Peter holds a spot for David, who’s noticea missing. And off to the side- Vick. Her face is impossible to read. Then suddenly- David arrives. Respectfully acknowledging the crowd, the father proceeds down the aisle as if heading to his pew at the front. But then, he stops. Right in the middle. Turns. His eyes searching, searching until- He spots Vick. Then David doesn’t peel his eyes away. And neither does she. Vick knows. Now David walks faster. But instead of sitting at his pew pausing at the memorial, he bee-lines to Vick, halts inch away from her face, and confronts her in a tense silence. Will Vick run? Will she confess? Attack David? Suddenly, entering from the side and front doors, five Si Valley Police Department officers make their way to the s Vick sees them. But still, she remains motionless, frozen David's glare until- The officers arrive, and Vick, instead of putting up a fi calmly offers her hands in surrender. The mourners watch in shock as Vick is whisked out of the church by the officers. And David follows them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HOMICIDE AGENT waits next to an empty table. Suddenly- Vick, in a denim prison uniform, enters. Expressionless. sits at the table. The Homicide Agent follows suit. And t

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: State your full name for the record, please.

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: Rosemary Clarice Vick.  Blue Rev. (11/01/16) 102.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: Ms. Vick, you are admitting to four counts of felony: obstruction of justice under color of law, conspiracy to commit kidnapping and/or false imprisonment, kidnapping and/or false imprisonment, and murder. Is that correct?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The church doors fly open. SVPD escorts Detective Vick through a large crowd of media and spectators and-

dialogues.speaker: CNN REPORTER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Excuse us. We are getting word now that an arrest has just been made inside the church where the memorial of Margot Kim is currently in progress. Though not confirmed, reports claim that the new suspect-- Vick is taken into an SUV, flanked by two police cars whe

dialogues.speaker: CNN REPORTER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: --is a law enforcement agent working on the case. David is escorted into the front seat of the SUV by SVPD

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: Okay. Let’s talk about the events leading up to your arrest last week, starting with Thursday May 11th when Margot Kim went missing. What happened that night?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: I got a phone call.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: And who was calling?

dialogues.speaker: MOMSANDDADSINBLUE.ORG
dialogues.text: 136 Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 103. A familiar picture loads. In it, A younger Rosemary Vick stands next to her son, who makes only the slightest eye contact with the camera.

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: My son. Its caption: “From left to right, Officer Rosemary Vick a her son Marvin, a student at Sunwood Middle School."

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: And what did he say? IPHONE UI - VICK’S PHONE An iPhone call from “Marvin.”

dialogues.speaker: MARVIN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: (out-of-breath) --Mom. I made a big mistake. I think I need to call 911.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: And what did you do after hearing the call?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: I met him.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: Where? IPHONE UI - VICK’S PHONE A text arrives from “Marvin.” It’s a dropped location pin

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Near Barbosa Lake. He was standing at the edge of a ravine.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Can you point to it on the map? We PINCH INTO the pin to reveal Marvin’s location on Appl Maps: the Santa Cruz Mountains, 500 feet west of Barbosa  Blue Rev. (11/01/16) 104.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: And what did Marvin tell you when you got there?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: He said ‘there’s a girl down there. I accidentally pushed a girl down there.’ So I asked him why.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: What did he say?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: --You have to understand, my son is not like the other kids. He’s different. He can be--

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: --What did he say?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: He said he needed to give her money back.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: What money?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: Six months ago, Marvin recognized Margot on a live blogging website. MOZILLA FIREFOX - MARVIN’S COMPUTER “YouCast.com" is entered into the address bar and-

dialogues.speaker: YOUCAST
dialogues.text: A pop-up appears on the splash page: “Welcome back, @fish_n_chips! A Facebook friend is live- casting for the first time. Wanna join?" The cursor hesitates and then- “YES.” Immediately, Margot’s first live-cast starts playing: In

dialogues.speaker: ROOM
dialogues.text: Margot, wearing braces, waits for a visitor.  Blue Rev. (11/01/16) 105.

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.0O.)
dialogues.text: He’s liked her since grade school. On the chat box next to Margot’s video, Marvin types: Fichn_chips: hey margot—

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Always knew about her life... ich a chips: : :

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ...and about her interests. Fish_n chips: favorite pokemon and why In the video, Margot leans in, reads the message, tries t hold back a smile, and then grabs something OFFSCREEN.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: So what did he do?

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: He continued talking to her.

dialogues.speaker: YOUCAST
dialogues.text: Marvin CLICKS “Edit Profile.” He changes his account info

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ...-Made up a story. Marvin enters a new age (18) and a new location (Pittsbur PA). But before he changes his profile picture, he TRAVEL

dialogues.speaker: GOOGLE IMAGE SEARCH
dialogues.text: -and types “teacher” before backspacing and typing “retai before backspacing and typing: “diner waitress." ENTER. Results load.

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ..-A new identity. The image on the fifth row: a familiar stock photo of “Ha Pardy,” the woman we now know to be a model in LA. CLICK.

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: For six months, he was her friend.  139 Blue Rev. (11/01/16) 106.

dialogues.speaker: YOUCAST
dialogues.text: We watch a series of familiar YouCast broadcasts. In them Marvin makes up a story about a sick mother and-

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: It was just role-playing. Harmless. We watch Margot, talking, talking, talking... In one YouCast broadcast, Margot speaks excitedly from th

dialogues.speaker: MARGOT
dialogues.text: By the way I’m sending you a little surprise I’ve been saving for tomorrow. I think you’re gonna really--

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Until the money. DING. MARVIN’S DESKTOP A Venmo notification slides onto the screen, notifying fish_n_chips of a new transaction.

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: She found his username on Venmo. CLICK. Suddenly, we’re looking at-

dialogues.speaker: VENMO
dialogues.text: A transaction receipt of $2,500. Its description: a emoji

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: $2,500 to take care of hospital expenses.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: Expenses that didn’t exist.

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: She was a good kid.  Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 107.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: And that was the cash he was returning.

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: He had to come clean. It was over.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: Why didn’t he just give it to her at school?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: She could've reacted the wrong way. In public. Marvin doesn’t like that kind of attention--

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: --So he followed her.

dialogues.speaker: TRAFFIC CAMERA FEEDS
dialogues.text: Alone in her green Toyota, Margot takes the exit for the East in Gilroy, California, captured on camera. But one thing none of us noticed the first time:

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: He followed her. In the car directly behind Margot, a stone-faced Marvin.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: And what was Margot doing when your son arrived at the lake.

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: She was getting high, in her car.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: And what happened then?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: He got inside.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: What was Margot’s reaction?  Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 108.

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: She screamed. She hit him. By the time Marvin noticed he was bleeding, she was already running and dialing for help. Marvin chased after. But it was pitch black.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: Where did he catch up with her?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: A few hundred yards west of the lake.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: By the ravine.

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: She was punching. Yelling. Marvin just reacted. He pushed back once and... she fell. Just disappeared. And then it was quiet.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: (beat) So then your son calls, asks for your help to cover up a murder--

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: --No. It was my decision. IPHONE UI - VICK’S PHONE The original call. Vick tries to calm Marvin down.

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Baby? Baby? I need you to take those breaths we talked about, okay? I don’t want you calling anyone. Mom will be there in a second. 141 EXT. VICK’S HOUSE - DAY (NEWS FOOTAGE) 141 On CNN, we see police escort a stone-faced Marvin from hi house into a police vehicle while-

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: It was my decision. Not his.  Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 109.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: So now you’re looking down this ravine. Could you see Margot’s body?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: Did you go down?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: I tried. But it was narrow, jagged, and at least 50 feet to rock bottom. Impossible without SAR.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: Then how did you figure--

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: --She was dead? It was narrow, jagged, and at least 50 feet to rock bottom. And it was dead quiet.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: So you helped your son.

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: I put her phone in the car and dumped the car in the lake.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: And the cash?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: Nothing could trace back to him.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: Then what?

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: Then I thought about my options. A police investigation was inevitable.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: So you decided to head it.

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: I needed to convince David his daughter ran away.  143 144 Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 110. PHOTOSHOP - VICK’S COMPUTER 143 We see Vick’s cursor upload a California driver’s license belonging to Rachel Jeun to Photoshop, and replace the picture with one of Margot’s. Then she changes the address.

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I photoshopped an ID...

dialogues.speaker: VENMO
dialogues.text: CLICK. Marvin’s Venmo Account is “DEACTIVATED.”

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ...told David that Marvin’s Venmo belonged to Margot and that Marvin's account on YouCast belonged to a girl who didn’t actually exist.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: But David found the car.

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.0O.)
dialogues.text: I scrambled. First I delayed the laptop from getting to forensics.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Then?

dialogues.speaker: A FAMILIAR PRESS CONFERENCE
dialogues.text: Vick points to a map of the search area, telling reporter that the area west of the lake had already been cleared.

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I told the law enforcement team that we'd already cleared the zone I knew her body was in and then told the volunteers to look elsewhere.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: --But still it was only a matter of time before they’d find the spot.  145 Blue Rev. (11/01/16) lll.

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: That's why I needed a confession. It was the only thing I could do to stop it.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: Okay. Let’s talk about Randy Cartoff.

dialogues.speaker: SILICON VALLEY HERALD NEWS WEBSITE
dialogues.text: We see the newspaper photo of Vick and Randy, smiling. Th RANDY’S CONFESSION VIDEO -starts to play. Meanwhile-

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: So you drugged up a “bum” you knew and fed him lines?

dialogues.speaker: RANDY
dialogues.text: (looking off-camera) She was really hurt, wasn’t she?

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: He was the only one without a family.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: What did you do with the video?

dialogues.speaker: LIVELEAK
dialogues.text: The video is uploaded to LiveLeak.

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I uploaded it. And planted his DNA near the lake.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT
dialogues.text: Was it really a suicide? Vick doesn’t answer.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He was murdered, wasn’t he? Silence.  146 Blue Rev. (11/01/16) 112.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Did you kill Randy Cartoff? Vick breaks down.

dialogues.speaker: VICK
dialogues.text: He’s my son. He made a mistake. We STAY ON Vick for awhile. Until finally-

dialogues.speaker: I/E. SAN JOSE STREETS
dialogues.text: An AERIAL SHOT FOLLOWS the SUV that carries Vick and Davi from the church. On the lower-third: “REPORT: LEAD DETECT

dialogues.speaker: NEWSCASTER 3, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: For those of you just joining from our affiliates in Sacramento, San Francisco and Los Angeles, we are now tracking an SUV carrying... The car (and its procession) continue as-

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: And on the way to the station, when you told all this to David, what did he do?

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.0O.)
dialogues.text: He asked a question.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: What did he ask? The SUV turns a signal on and begins to switch lanes as-

dialogues.speaker: CNN ANCHOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: In just a few seconds, the SUV will arrive at the police station where--

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: --He asked if I was sure Margot was dead.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: And what did you say? The SUV approaches a fork-in-the-road and-  147 Blue Rev. (11/01/16) 113.

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I said even if she survived that fall, she would have had to live 5 days without food or water.

dialogues.speaker: HOMICIDE AGENT, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: And how did David respond? The SUV makes a right turn as-—

dialogues.speaker: VICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: He corrected me. He said 2 days. Margot would have had to live without food or water for 2 days. (beat) There was a storm on Monday. Suddenly- TIRES SCREECH and SIRENS BLARE as THE SUV CRANKS A U-TURN THE MIDDLE OF THE STREET... ...and SPEEDS OFF in the opposite direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We’re back in the Santa Cruz Mountains, where- The rescue mission is underway. From San Jose to New York, live footage of the operation (captured by aerial and ground cameras) is streamed on networks across the nation. In the footage- A Search-and-Rescue helicopter HOVERS over a deep RAVINE. Text over the image: “Santa Cruz Mountains, 5:06 PM PST.”

dialogues.speaker: CNN ANCHOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We are currently watching a rescue operation underway for missing teen Margot Kim, who authorities now believe is at the bottom of this Northern California ravine. Above the ravine, police officers, fire marshals, and a h anxious David Kim watch as- A RESCUE RESPONDER descends from the edge of the ravine a disappears into the abyss below.  Pink Rev. (11/04/16) 114.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A News Anchor speaks into the CAMERA. To his left, an OTS graphic with the text: “SEARCH BECOMES RESCUE."

dialogues.speaker: NEWS ANCHOR 4
dialogues.text: Presumed dead only hours ago, the search for Margot Kim is revitalized this evening after a suspect in custody has provided authorities with Ms. Kim’s exact location. The only question that remains, however: is Margot still alive... or is it already too late?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David can barely contain his emotions while-

dialogues.speaker: NEWS PUNDITS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I mean, is there even a chance she survives after all this time? / Even if she were to make it out of this, what kind of injuries are we looking at? Suddenly, the Responder’s rope begins to raise as-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A DOCTOR is interviewed via split-screen, on CNN. Text be ID's him as “Dr. Angel Palacios, Silicon Valley Trauma."

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Assuming Margot is still alive, and I pray that she is, we are realistically looking... at broken legs, a sprained or broken neck, injuries to the spinal cord, severe blood clots from immobility, heavy bruising, hypothermia, dehydration, and that’s not even mentioning the mental damage: shock, trauma--

dialogues.speaker: CNN ANCHOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: --Hold on guys. It looks like something is happening. The split-screen disappears and back on the live rescue-  151 115.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David and a team of EMTs huddle as shapes begin to emerge from ravine below. Inch by inch by inch until-

dialogues.speaker: CNN ANCHOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Oh my god. There she is. Strapped to a rescue basket, bruised and broken, covered dirt and blood and grime and placed on the forest floor.. .+.is Margot Kim. The EMTs immediately surround the unresponsive Margot, checking vitals and slowly transporting her body onto a stretcher when David pushes through the group. Even from the HIGH ANGLE, we clearly track his emotions.. David gently CARESSES his daughter’s body, KISSING her an WHISPERING into her ear for what seems like an eternity w Margot RAISES her hand to David's face. David doesn’t not Until she TOUCHES him. Smiling through his tears and crying through his laughter David GRIPS his daughter’s hand and steps aside... EMTs carry a barely-alive Margot to a waiting ambulance a FADE OUT. DESKTOP - MARGOT’S LAPTOP - 1 YEAR LATER A familiar wallpaper of Margot and Pam loads first. Then comes the dock. Then the cursor, which OPENS-

dialogues.speaker: GOOGLE CHROME
dialogues.text: -and TRAVELS to “sfmc.edu” which autofills after the “s.” website loads and suddenly we’re on the splash page of th

dialogues.speaker: SAN FRANCISCO MUSIC CONSERVATORY WEBSITE
dialogues.text: The cursor finds a corner of the page with a small link: “Application Status.” CLICK. On the next page, a progress bar: “Your application to st PIANO at the San Francisco Music Conservatory is PENDING. Please check again later for updates." Suddenly- The cursor DARTS to-  152 116.

dialogues.speaker: IMESSAGE
dialogues.text: -and starts drafting a text to “Dad” when we realize who’ operating the computer: Margot Kim. urgh still no news in their defense they did say they would’nt let you know until october what if i dont get in You'll get in.

dialogues.speaker: PS
dialogues.text: I never sent you the photo From last month what—photo? A photo is received: a first-day-of-school-selfie, taken

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even though Margot now sits in a wheelchair, the faces of David and Margot remind us of the good old days. Silly. Happy. Love.

dialogues.speaker: IMESSAGE
dialogues.text: Ew i look gross Oh my god!! ido!!! anyways gotta go Margot’s cursor RETURNS to the-

dialogues.speaker: SAN FRANCISCO MUSIC CONSERVATORY WEBSITE
dialogues.text: Margot presses REFRESH on the “Application Status” window No Updates. But then, DING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Totally understand. That page isn’t just gonna refresh itself That's not what I’m doing. Margot SPAMS the REFRESH button. Nothing. Nothing. Nothin But in all seriousness I'm so proud of you Margot drags her cursor to the texts while David bubbles. I know Mom would be, too know +} love _you eversince thank you for always reminding me :) ok. Now please focus on school.

dialogues.speaker: OH
dialogues.text: Just remembered! I have a study group tonight. oh. Okay... Where? Well that’s the thing. I actually told them to come to our place. Is that okay? David bubbles for a beat. And then- Yeah. It totally is. I'll make muddy buddies. See you tonight. See you tonight. Margot CLICKS on the Apple logo at the top-left of the screen. She presses “Shut Down” and is about to confirm t selection on “Are you sure you want to shut down?" when- She stops. Then CANCELS the shut-down. Margot scrolls up her text chain with “Dad” and finds a photo. She RIGHT-CLICKS, scrolls past a series of options and settles on: “Set Desktop Picture." CLICK. And then- Every app quits.
